data.name: 洞主
data.text: 啊这，这是我今天第一条树洞啊

post.text:
My mother was born there
A vast area of 9.6 million square kilometers
Where the Yellow River and the Yangtze River flow
Countless poets and writers shed tears for it
Countless soldiers died for it
People there have
Black hair black eyes yellow earth like skin
140,000 people are industrious, frugal and virtuous
But through endless suffering
Famine, drought, flood, earthquake
Coups, upheavals, wars, massacres
Die and live, and live and die
What's hard to erase is that
An unyielding spirit of struggle
/
Europa, sneered the Americans
The old feelings of mokua
Do not hold the exquisite material
The Chinese nation has been slavish since ancient times
Look at the Great Wall qinling Underground Palace
A service person
Build up the emperor's legacy
Proud of the end of the heaven afraid of me
The ship's cannon is tall to the Lord
A shot fired wins the battle
A million loaves of earth in hand
Two thousand silver and gold are offered to me
This is a national shame
This is the elegy of The Times
/
Do you know
The bitter and the bitter
Suffer the world's pain and ridicule
Will eventually ignite the counter-fire wind
Cry out to the king and the general
The wind and the wind move
Fire a room green forest lift up the earth
The Taiping sickle dance
Check our
As a farmer, so as a laborer
Become the hero of the remade world
Meaningless those
Suppress a thousand years of resentment
To bear the scars of a lifetime
